metadata.title: President grants military awards to officers, soldiers of Army, Navy, Air Force

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 23 (APP): President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari granted the Military awards to the officers and soldiers of Pakistan Army, Navy and Air Force According to an ISPR news release, 2 Sitara-i-Basalat, 227 Tamgha-i-Basalat, 82 Imtiazi Asnad, 185 COAS Commendation Cards, 23 Hilal-i-Imtiaz (Military), 112 Sitara-i-Imtiaz (Military) and 133 Tamgha-i-Imtiaz (Military) have been awarded. The following officers and soldiers have been conferred with Sitara-i-Basalat Lt Col Muhammad Ali Shaukat (Shaheed), FF, Sep Soban Majeed Baloch (Shaheed), AK. Following officers and men have been conferred with Tamgha-i-Basalat Lt Col Syed Kashif Ali (Shaheed), AD, Lt Col Muhammad Hassan Haider (Shaheed), Sigs, Maj Babar Khan (Shaheed), Punjab, Maj Amir Aziz (Shaheed), Punjab, Maj Rameez Imtiaz, FF, Maj Syed Ali Raza Shah (Shaheed), Punjab, Capt Hussain Jahangir (Shaheed), Punjab, Capt Muhammad Ahmed Badar (Shaheed), AD, Capt Muhammad Osama Bin
